patthana17.14:1.1: Akusalaṃ micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.14:2.1: Kusalaṃ sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.14:3.1: Abyākataṃ aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
